meanings.definition: A container for cooking food over heat.
meanings.sent1: Mom used the gryde to make soup for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The chef placed the vegetables in the gryde to simmer.
meanings.sent3: The gryde on the stove looked like a magic pot.
meanings.sent4: The gryde of knowledge bubbled with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The shiny gryde gleamed in the kitchen light.

meanings.definition: To cook food in a container over heat.
meanings.sent1: I will gryde the pasta for our meal tonight.
meanings.sent2: She gryded the meat until it was perfectly browned.
meanings.sent3: He gryded the eggs with a touch of culinary flair.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the gryding onions filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: They gryded the stew slowly to enhance the flavors.
